mapper.select: select * from( select PROJECT.*, GIFT.gCount, ITEM.iCount, IMAGE.iFCount from project PROJECT left outer join (select P.project_no, count(G.gift_no) gCount from project P inner join gift G on P.project_no = G.project_no group by P.project_no) GIFT on PROJECT.project_no = GIFT.project_no left outer join (select P.project_no, count(I.item_no) iCount from project P inner join item I on P.project_no = I.project_no group by P.project_no) ITEM on PROJECT.project_no = ITEM.project_no left outer join (select P.project_no, count(IF.image_no) iFCount from project P inner join image_file IF on P.project_no = IF.project_no where IF.project_state = 'Y' group by P.project_no) IMAGE on PROJECT.project_no = IMAGE.project_no ) where project_no = #{projectNo}
